enterprise_cloud_database_create_title: Ordering an Enterprise Cloud Databases cluster
enterprise_cloud_database_create_descrip: High-availability managed databases, based on a dedicated, scalable hardware infrastructure. Our database clusters are replicated across different geographical regions, and have automatic failover and daily backup mechanisms. Each cluster has its own dedicated hardware resources, so that it can harness the power of our next-generation hardware. Offer your users optimal performance for your applications.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_choose_: A cluster is configured to use a DBMS, which can be used to create multiple databases.
As a general rule, you will need to choose the region closest to your infrastructure. The exact composition of datacenters and associated SLAs is detailed in the official documentation.
Select a configuration for your cluster
You can also add or delete nodes after you have created your cluster.
{{ numDefaultNodes }} dedicated nodes are included by default
enterprise_cloud_database_create_additio: You can add or delete nodes at any time after you have created your cluster. 1 replica is included by default.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_order_b: Order an Enterprise Cloud Database cluster
enterprise_cloud_database_create_billing: You will be billed via your default payment method.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_success: Your order has been processed. Your cluster will appear on this page once it has been delivered. You can track the progress of the delivery in your account, in the My orders section.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_error: An error has occurred creating your cluster: {{ message }}
enterprise_cloud_database_create_order_e: An error has occurred creating the order: {{ message }}
enterprise_cloud_database_no_default_pay: No default payment method found. You will need to set a default payment method to create a Enterprise Cloud Databases cluster. Set a default payment method
enterprise_cloud_database_create_commitm: The service is automatically renewed after the subscription period, and billed using your default payment method. You can modify this via the “My services” page.
enterprise_cloud_database_create_confirm: An Enterprise Cloud Databases cluster will be created after payment is received. This action will take around 1 hour.
The payment method below will be used for this order, and for future renewals.
You can modify your renewal options at any time in the “My services” section of your account.
